scripts.boot-full: npm install && npm run boot -- --scope=@covidtop/dev && npm run build-dev && npm run boot && npm run build
scripts.clean-full: npm run clean && node ./scripts/dev run clean-full && lerna clean --yes
scripts.format-full: node ./scripts/dev run prettier && npm run format
scripts.build-production: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./scripts/dev run build-production
scripts.start-dev-api: wait-on --log tcp:chart:3400 && cd ./packages/api && npm run start-dev
scripts.start-production-api: wait-on --log tcp:chart:3400 && cd ./packages/api && npm run start-production
scripts.start-dev-web: wait-on --log tcp:api:4100 && cd ./packages/web && npm run start-dev
scripts.start-production-web: wait-on --log tcp:api:4100 && cd ./packages/web && npm run start-production
scripts.start-dev: npm run build && docker-compose -p covidtop_development -f ./docker/development/docker-compose.yml up
